text: Department of the Treasury Internal Revenue Service
This obsoletes IRM 4.15.2, Jeopardy/Termination Assessments, Examination Procedures.
The contents of this IRM moved to IRM 4.15.1, Jeopardy/Termination Assessments, Jeopardy and Terminations. This IRM will be made obsolete simultaneously with the publishing of the updated IRM

IRM Reference Description of Changes 4.15.2.1 This IRM is obsolete. Relevant information moved to IRM 4.15.1. 4.15.2.2 • IRM 4.15.2.2.1 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7.1, • IRM 4.15.2.2.2 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7.2, • IRM 4.15.2.2.3 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7.3, • IRM 4.15.2.2.4 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7.4, • IRM 4.15.2.2.5 moved to IRM 4.15.1.6(2) and • IRM 4.15.2.2.6 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7.7. 4.15.2.3 IRM 4.15.2.3 moved to IRM 4.15.1.8. 4.15.2.4 • IRM 4.15.2.4.1.1 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7, • IRM 4.15.2.4.1.2 moved to IRM 4.15.1.7, • IRM 4.15.2.4.1.3 moved to IRM 4.15.1.9 and • IRM 4.15.2.4.1.4 moved to IRM 4.15.1.9 4.15.2.5 IRM 4.15.2.5 moved to IRM 4.15.1.10. No. 28045H (07-26-2021) Internal Revenue Manual 4.15.2
IRM 4.15.2, Jeopardy/Termination Assessments, Examination Procedures, dated October 4, 2018 is obsolete as of the date of this transmittal.
